page.title: 24Update on the Energy Park
page.content:
The Energy park was a nice idea, but once the initial buildings were completed the enthusiasm for it seemed to wither & die. Yes there were houses with lots of good insulation that provided a showcase, but the giant Wind Turbine on the site never worked properly & it was so noisy that the neighbours complained until it was demolished a few years later, after being idle for several years.

Its just another housing estate now.
Shawfields
